abstract: Editorial praises ThriveNYC, initiative put forth by New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio to deal with city's surging mental illness epidemic; holds plan offers multi-pronged and multi-agency road map for addressing often-ignored ailments that contribute to homelessness, drug use and incarceration, and strengthens protections for city's most vulnerable residents; cautions implementation will prove strenuous and success is not guaranteed.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Bill de Blasio unveiled a citywide initiative to tackle mental illness and addiction.

headline.main: Treating Mental Illness in New York, From All Angles
headline.print_headline: Treating Mental Illness, From All Angles

snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio unveiled a citywide initiative to tackle mental illness and addiction.
